QuestData.Title: We Have the Power
QuestData.Description: We're almost there, but the war golem won't run without power cells. From the information I was able to collect in Dun Argol before we were discovered, both Rune-Smith Durar and Rune-Smith Kathorn each create one power cell.$B$BWe'll need one power cell from each of the rune-smiths before our golem will work.$B$BYou should be able to find each rune-smith in his workshop on the central level of Dun Argol.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Durar's Power Cell and Kathorn's Power Cell to Raegar Breakbrow at Prospector's Point.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, did you get those power cells?
QuestData.RewardText: <Raegar takes the batteries from you.>$B$BExcellent! We should be all ready to go.
